resources.string: Your login credentials will only be used to login to Quest. They will be stored using Google Credential API (e.g. Google stores your password), Netflix uses this same technique.

Please ensure you have enabled Google Credential, otherwise this might not work. The app will try to pull your grades and check for an update every 15 minutes. You will be notified to re-login if a pull is unsuccessful. If you are done with the grades please click stop notification to turn off the service.
